title: Embracing turns of the season and fresh starts
description: We tend to think of January as the month for new beginnings, but September is as potent for renewal as the beginning of the year. Maybe even more so. It’s like a second spring. The lull of summer break that has let ideas sit and ruminate gives way to a sense of renewal, a new feeling […]

title: The mirror world
description: Once you start looking for the mirror world, you see it everywhere. AI chatbots are mirrors of experts, only instead of giving you informed opinions, they plagiarize sentence-fragments into statistically plausible paragraphs… Your own brand – something we’re increasingly expected to have – is the mirror world image of you. Another place I saw it […]

title: Women are never the right age at work
description: Yeah…… I had multiple vendors who called me “Miss Tracy” (though to be fair I’d rather get “miss”-ed than “ma’am”-ed). A mayor called my colleague and I in our late twenties “girls” while thanking us for a presentation we gave to the City Council 🙄 “You’re too young and then, in a moment in time, […]
